page.title: 10LEVERHULME SPORTS FIELD.
page.content: LeverHulme Sports Field was opened on the 29th April 1967 by MR A.D.BONHAM CARTER B.A.T.D.Director of Unilever limited & Unilever N.V.At the field there are 12 tennis courts,5 football pitches,3 rugby pitches,2 hockey pitches ,3 cricket squares and 4 sets of training lights.It was built for the{recreation}of the people who lived in Port Sunlight and for the people who worked in LeverHulme factories. Also at the field they have a club which has changing rooms and shower etc.3 farm barns are used for storing goal posts for the fields.From the field you can see Christ The King RC church very clearly.
